data.name: Form.ExtendPasteDialog._messageLabel
data.value: Do you want to paste it ?

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteDialog._subMessageLabel.Check
data.value: Contents see check box ON the confirmation.

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteDialog._subMessageLabel.Wait
data.value: Paste with {0} seconds to run. (Cancel or ESC key abort)

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteOptionPanel._afterSpecifiedTimePasteCheck
data.value: Paste after specified time elapsed (0-60sec) (Waiting time can cancel a paste)

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteOptionPanel._changeDialogSize
data.value: Allow change dialog size (Use if you want to check the contents of the clipboard in a wide range)

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteOptionPanel._descriptionLabel
data.value:
ExtendPaste plugin is a plugin to display the contents of the Clipboard when pasting.
Highlight characters that contain the keyword specified in the data on the Clipboard. Run paste actually can paste even after the specified number of seconds has elapsed, the it is possible to cancel the paste if within that time.
These features prevent the paste of unintended command, it will be able to prevent human error as much as possible.
Also, standard paste command replaces extended paste command.

data.name: Form.ExtendPasteOptionPanel._showConfirmCheck
data.value: Show "Confirmed" check box in dialog (OK button is not enabled until you check to ON)

data.name: Message.ExtendPasteDialog.InvalidRegEx
data.value: The value of regular expression pattern is invalid. {0}
